title: Event Recommendation Engine
summary: As a developer, I want to create an event recommendation engine that suggests social activities for elderly users based on their interests, so that they can engage more with their community and reduce feelings of isolation.

title: Social Media Integration
summary: As a developer, I want to integrate social media platforms with ALFRED so that elderly users can easily connect with friends and family, enhancing their social engagement and reducing isolation.

title: User Interest Profiling for Social Activities
summary: As a developer, I want to create an API that allows ALFRED to gather and analyze user interests for social activities, so that I can help recommend events that enhance social engagement and reduce isolation among elderly users.

title: Support for Group Communication Features
summary: As a developer, I want to implement group communication features within ALFRED so that elderly users can easily connect with family and friends, enhancing their social engagement and reducing isolation.

title: Personalized Activity Suggestions
summary: As a developer, I want to create a feature that suggests personalized activities for elderly users based on their interests and health status, so that they can remain socially engaged and physically active.

title: Community Engagement Tracking
summary: As a developer, I want to implement a community engagement tracking feature in ALFRED so that elderly users can easily participate in social activities and caregivers can monitor their involvement, ensuring a supportive social environment.

title: Notification System for Social Activities
summary: As a developer, I want to create an API that allows third-party applications to send notifications about social activities to users, so that elderly users can stay informed and engaged with events that match their interests.

title: Privacy Controls for Social Interactions
summary: As a developer, I want to implement privacy controls for social interactions within the ALFRED system so that users can manage their data sharing preferences and ensure their personal information is protected while engaging with friends and family.

title: Social Event Management API
summary: As a developer, I want an API that allows me to integrate social event management features into my applications so that elderly users can easily discover and participate in events that match their interests, enhancing their social engagement.
